column3:
Wednesday 6:12 P.M.
The dusk was settling majestically over Tokyo, after a rare smogless day. The view was particularly inspiring from the fifty-fifth-floor penthouse of the granite-clad Mino Industries building.
At 06:12 Noreen brings another whole tray thatâ€™s dinner, we can have dinner at five something or six something or even seven something, Ma says.
